content.raw:
I don't know much about real world sensor data, but if they have constant Hz, then we could probably pre-compute the   
time label, instead of traversal? Assume we know the time step of simulation.   
Another issue related to this is: say if the real world data is at 100 Hz (might be a weird number),  then the real world is updated   
every 0.01 second. If our simulation time step is 0.003 second, then we could probably need interpolating, but this is too detailed...
